beer.beer_description:
• LUPPOLO DOMINANTE •
Cascade coltivato in Italia
• PROFILO •
Una pregiata lager, dal corpo rotondo e generosamente luppolata, caratterizzata dall’uso di una varietà di luppolo coltivato in Italia.
• ABBINAMENTI •
Ideale con primi piatti dal gusto rotondo e formaggi di media stagionatura o in accompagnamento a piatti a base di cereali, verdure e pesci bianchi.

-----

4 Luppoli Originale (Original beer with 4 hops varieties) is a low fermentation lager with a particularly harmonious flavour.
 
Fruity aromatic notes sweeten its moderately bitter taste.

Hops: Cascade, Columbus, Herkules, Zeus.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 60 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 13!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 60 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 13!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 40 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 9!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least That's 350 distinct venues!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 90 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 19!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 155 distinct venues!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 30 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 7!

Some may argue that wine is better than beer, especially in a country so well known for its vineyards. We all know they’re wrong. Cheers! That’s 5 beers from a brewery in Italy. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 65 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 14!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 70 check-ins with a photo.
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 40 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 9!
